entry.title: Scottish football's 150 days of VAR tedium - disruption, fan responsibility, what is the answer?
entry.summary: You can imagine Crawford Allan, the SFA’s head of refereeing, glancing at his phone sometime around 5pm on Saturday and thinking ‘oh, oh’. And you certainly wouldn’t have blamed him for removing the SIM card and disposing of it over the side of a bridge before driving off into the distance never to be seen or heard from ever again.
